title: Carbone
plot: Danger of losing his business, Anthony Roca, an ordinary man, develops a scam that will become the heist of the century. Overtaken by the crime, he will have to deal with betrayal, murder and settling.
writers: Emmanuel Naccache, Olivier Marchal, Ali Hajdi
stars: Benoît Magimel, Gringe, Idir Chender, Laura Smet

others.job: Second Unit Director or Assistant Director

companies: Les Films Manuel Munz, EuropaCorp, Nexus Factory

plotShort.plainText:
Carbon (2017 film)
Carbon (French: Carbone) is a 2017 French crime film directed by Olivier Marchal.

similars.title: Borderline
similars.plot: A police superintendent, after 25 years of a flawless professional career, is arrested by internal affairs for 4 days, before being indicted for criminal conspiracy, drug trafficking, theft and embezzlement by the magistrate in charge.
similars.stars: Bruno Wolkowitch, Catherine Marchal, Patrick Catalifo

similars.title: A Gang Story - Eine Frage der Ehre
similars.fullTitle: A Gang Story - Eine Frage der Ehre (2011)
similars.plot: After growing up in a poor gypsy camp, Edmond Vidal, aka Momon, has retained a sense of family, unfailing loyalty and pride in his origins. Most of all, he has remained friends with Serge ... See full summary »
similars.stars: Gérard Lanvin, Tchéky Karyo, Daniel Duval

similars.title: The Last Deadly Mission
similars.plot: A washed-up Marseilles cop (Auteuil) earns a chance at redemption by protecting a woman from the man who killed her parents as he is about to be released from prison.
similars.stars: Daniel Auteuil, Olivia Bonamy, Catherine Marchal

similars.title: Gangsters
similars.plot: Franck Chaievski and Nina Delgado are two undercover detectives of a French special force trying to identify two corrupts members of the Paris Police Force. Franck is pretending to be a ... See full summary »
similars.stars: Richard Anconina, Anne Parillaud, François Levantal

similars.title: 36th Precinct
similars.plot: 2 cops are promised by the retiring chief of the Paris police that the one, getting the violent gang robbing armored trucks, will get his job. The 2 will do whatever it takes to get the promotion, even if it means breaking the law.
similars.stars: Daniel Auteuil, Gérard Depardieu, André Dussollier

similars.title: Penrose Affair
similars.plot: Mourning the lose of his own wife, a French Inspector bonds with an American amnesiac who is convinced his wife's murder in Paris was part of an international conspiracy.

similars.title: Fast Convoy
similars.plot: A "go fast" convoy shipping a ton of cannabis Malaga in southern Spain is disrupted following a shoot out that results in the kidnapping of a tourist.
similars.stars: Benoît Magimel, Reem Kherici, Tewfik Jallab

similars.title: Carbon
similars.plot: Sibi Sebastian and his never ending struggle to make it big in life, his quest for new horizons and opportunities. While others pass by, his relentless determination takes him to the most unexpected situation in his life.
similars.stars: Fahadh Faasil, Mamta Mohandas, Manikandan R. Achari

similars.title: The Connection
similars.plot: A French police magistrate spends years trying to take down one of the country's most powerful drug rings.
similars.stars: Jean Dujardin, Gilles Lellouche, Céline Sallette

similars.title: Paris Lockdown
similars.plot: A Parisian criminal gang fall apart after challenges to the gang's leader lessen his influence.
similars.stars: Benoît Magimel, Philippe Caubère, Béatrice Dalle
